name: Quick 3D Cover Design File
summary: Learn about .Q2D files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Q2D files are used for projecting 2D designs onto the 3D images stored in .Q3C files.
NOTE: Q2D files are created with the Designer component of Quick 3D Cover.

description: Cover design created with the Quick 3D Cover, a program used to create 3D product images for software boxshots, eBooks, jewel cases, and other products; stores the selected design template as well as user-specified text, graphics, and colors.
